# size

**Instance Property**

The size of the element.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var size: NSSize { get set }
```

## Discussion

Setting the value of this property also updates the value in the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCollectionViewLayoutAttributes/frame] property.

## Accessing the Layout Attributes

- **frame**: The frame rectangle of the element.
- **alpha**: The transparency of the element.
- **isHidden**: A Boolean value indicating whether the element is hidden.
- **zIndex**: The element’s position on the z axis.
